ascend_skill.desc:
Each time an ally deals damage, gain 1 Verse stack.
At 14+ Verse stacks, activate Resonance and spend 14 stacks of Verse to deal follow-up Curse damage to the last foe Sumi targeted, equal to 65%/98%/130% of Attack (effect changes at Lv. 1/50/70, respectively).
*Verse of Hate, Verse of Healing, and Verse of Passion all also count as Verse stacks.
ascend_skill.name: Sonnet of Fate

ascend_skill.desc: After using a skill, increase damage of the next Sonnet of Fate by 40%.
ascend_skill.name: Fishing Pond Master

ascend_skill.desc: Increase Attack of Sonnet of Fate by 50%, and inflict Curse on foes hit.
ascend_skill.name: Flight and Conflict

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Unexpected Tragedy and Absurd Comedy by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Passion for Creation

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase damage of Sonnet of Fate the next 4 times.
ascend_skill.name: Scream from the Soul

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Tragicomedy of Love and Thief Tactics by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Throes of Creation

ascend_skill.desc:
After using a skill, the Verse of Hate, Verse of Healing, or Verse of Passion gained activates 3 more times next turn.
If 2 or more different types of Verses are stacked, increase Sonnet of Fate damage by 67%.
ascend_skill.name: Life Advice

highlight_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to 96.8%/106.7%/100.8%/110.7% of Attack (3 hits). Increase Sumi's Attack for Sonnet of Fate by 50.6%/55.7%/52.6%/57.8% up to 2 times.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to 58.6%/64.6%/61.0%/67.0% of Attack (3 hits), and gain 3 Verse of Hate stacks.
The next time Verse stacks are gained, 25% chance to change to Verse of Hate (max 2).
When spending Verse of Hate stacks to deal damage with Sonnet of Fate, 30% chance to inflict Curse for each Verse of Hate spent.
normal_skill.name: Unexpected Tragedy

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 35.7%/39.3%/37.1%/40.8% of Attack (2 hits), and gain 2 Verse of Healing stacks.
The next time Verse stacks are gained, 25% chance to change to Verse of Healing (max 2).
When spending Verse of Healing stacks to deal damage with Sonnet of Fate, restore HP to the ally with the lowest remaining HP by 7.5% of Sumi's Attack for each Verse of Healing spent.
normal_skill.name: Absurd Comedy

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to 41.5%/45.7%/43.2%/47.4% of Attack (5 hits), and gain 5 Verse of Passion stacks.
The next time Verse stacks are gained, 25% chance to change to Verse of Passion (max 2).
When spending Verse of Passion stacks to deal damage with Sonnet of Fate, deal bonus Almighty damage equal to 7% of Attack for each Verse of Passion spent.
normal_skill.name: Tragicomedy of Love

passive_skill.desc: Increase damage of Sonnet of Fate on foes with Curse by 50.0%.
passive_skill.name: The Other Prison

passive_skill.desc: For each Verse of Hate, Verse of Healing, or Verse of Passion stack spent, increase damage of Sonnet of Fate by 10.0%.
passive_skill.name: This Beautiful Woman
